description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Naoki Tales is an arcade adventure game in the style of Super Mario Bros. or The Great Giana Sisters.  When Naoki returned home from a vacation his girlfriend was taken by an evil spirit.  Travel through more than 35 levels, facing various creatures and traps in your quest to save her! Full version: -Over 35 Levels -High Score Table -Continue Support -Update Free
